# Purpose
This page demonstrate different markdown usage possibilities.

### Highlight
You can higlight `some words` or express them as **bold**, _italic_ or
```
place some text in the box
```
or have
- a bullets
  - or subbulets
- read more in the tutorial: [basic](https://tutorial.termx.org/en/basic-markdown-syntax) features and [advanced](https://tutorial.termx.org/en/extended-markdown-syntax) features.



### JSON example


```json
{
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Igor"
}
```

### Mermaid example

```mermaid
graph TD
    EEBasePatient -->|inherited| EEMPIPatient
    EEMPIPatient -->|Verified| EEMPIPatientVerified
    EEMPIPatient -->|Unknown| EEMPIPatientUnknown
    EEMPIPatient -->|Newborn| EEMPIPatientNewborn
    EEMPIPatient -->|Stillborn| EEMPIPatientStillBorn
    EEBaseRelatedPerson --> |inherited| EEMPIRelatedPerson
    EEMPIPatient --> |related to| EEMPIRelatedPerson
    EEBaseObservation --> |inherited| MpiSocialHistoryLegalGuardianStatus
    EEMPIPatient --> |related to| MpiSocialHistoryLegalGuardianStatus
    EEBaseRelatedPerson --> |related to| MpiSocialHistoryLegalGuardianStatus
```

### PlantUML examples

```plantuml
Bob->Alice : Hello
Bob <-- Alice: Hello. Please visit https://plantuml.com/
```

```plantuml
@startmindmap
* Debian
** Ubuntu
*** Linux Mint
*** Kubuntu
*** Lubuntu
*** KDE Neon
** LMDE
** SolydXK
** SteamOS
** Raspbian with a very long name
*** <s>Raspmbc</s> => OSMC
*** <s>Raspyfi</s> => Volumio
@endmindmap
```

